title: "Leveraging Uncertainty from Deep Learning for Trustworthy Material Discovery Workflows"
excerpt: "In this paper, we leverage predictive uncertainty of deep neural networks to answer challenging questions material scientists usually encounter in machine learning-based material application workflows."
